discourse_list.title: ECDC 2018 - Ethereum Client Devs Conference - June 29-31 in Berlin

content.content: Mainly talks and deep dives, this is a very important gathering attended by the Ethereum client developers and protocol / sharding researchers. Attendee List: https://hackmd.io/s/HkeG0Sek7  Day 1: Agenda    HackMD    Day 1: Full Agenda! - HackMD # Day 1: Full Agenda!  |Time    |  Event    | Notes / Background material | |---     | ------    | -       Sharding Q&A w/ Vitalik Buterin and Justin Drake:  Slide snaps by Alex Beregszaszi: https://twitter.com/alexberegszaszi/status/1012727846241013763 “Open Discussion & Workshops” scheduled for the early evening  Day 2: Agenda    HackMD    Day 2: Full Agenda! - HackMD # Day 2: Full Agenda!  |Time    |  Event    | Notes / Background material | |---     | ------    | -       “Rent Round Table” to be led by Philip Daian “Eth1.0 -> 2.0 Round Table” to be led by Danny Ryan  Day 3: Ethereum Sharding Research Compendium    HackMD    Research compendium - HackMD # Research compendium  See https://notes.ethereum.org/s/H1PGqDhpm for newer version.        I’m really glad that @lrettig will be there!
I wish that this particular core developer was there.  But I didn’t know about it, and the schedule is impossible–so close and yet so far from our Council.  When and where was this announced?
Are there recordings for the talks before Justin and Vitalik’s?
Update: this is the live feed of the ECDC Day 3. Ethereum Sharding Meeting https://media.livepeer.org/channels/0x0dDB225031cCB58fF42866f82D907F7766899014
